name: Baby Milk Action
goal:
Baby Milk Action is the UK member of the global network, IBFAN (the International Baby Food Action network) that aims to stop misleading marketing by the baby feeding industry. We protect breastfeeding and babies fed on formula to prevent unnecessary death, ill health and suffering. www.ibfan.org
IBFAN is in official relations with the World Health organisations
We are the secretariat of the UK Baby Feeding law Group which works with IBFAN for policy coherence of EU policies with the World Health Assembly Resolutions on infant and young child feeding. www.babyfeedinglawgroup.org.uk
We are a founder member of the Conflict of Interest Network that consists of 162 public interest organisations united by the common objective of safeguarding public health policy-making against commercial conflicts of interests. http://coicoalition.blogspot.com
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Humanitarian Aid, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Trade
